req_description: Implement secure payment processing with multiple payment providers (Stripe, PayPal, Square). Include PCI-DSS compliance, tokenization, and real-time fraud detection. Support for credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets.

Build centralized authentication service with OAuth 2.0/OIDC support. Implement JWT-based session management, multi-factor authentication (MFA), single sign-on (SSO) capabilities, and role-based access control (RBAC).

Redesign order processing workflow to support real-time inventory synchronization, multi-warehouse fulfillment, automated order routing, and integration with shipping carriers (FedEx, UPS, USPS). Include order tracking and notification system.
